name: DPI
tag_list: visualization, communication, interactive, media, architect, concept, augmented, 3d
overview: DPI Holding, the leading company on the field of visualization and communication, is situated in the harbour of Scheveningen, The Hague, The Netherlands. The 3D and interactive media producers of DPI Animation House, the marketing and communication advisors of zootz, the architects of BINT, the concept developers of Cnut and the interior designers of Binnenmaat work from the same premises, ensuring the best possible quality, flexibility and speed.
